sentences.sContent: But when they didn't open the gate he sat down, took his lute and played enchanting music on it with his two forefeet.
sentences.sContent_eng: But when they didn't open the gate he sat down, took his lute and played enchanting music on it with his two forefeet.
sentences.sCn: 门没开，于是，小驴儿坐下来，拿出琵琶，用两只前脚弹奏动听的音乐。

words.tran: 涂胶泥；用油灰接合；火泥密封
用封泥封；弹诗琴（lute的ing形式）
